sentences.en: Anti-abortionists are gloating over the court's decision.
sentences.cn: 反堕胎主义者对法庭的裁决沾沾自喜。

sentences.en: Do not gloat when your enemy falls.
sentences.cn: 不要因为敌人的失败而幸灾乐祸.

sentences.en: Don't gloat over your rival's misfortune.
sentences.cn: 不要幸灾乐祸于对手的厄运.

sentences.en: Don't gloat,the same misfortune may happen to you one day.
sentences.cn: 不要幸灾乐祸，说不定同样的不幸会落到你的头上。

sentences.en: Don't you think it's a little unkind to gloat over your competitor's failure?
sentences.cn: 你难道不认为对你对手的失败幸灾乐祸是有点不近人情 吗 ?

sentences.en: I can count all my bones; people stare and gloat over me.
sentences.cn: 17我的骨头、我都能数过. 他们瞪著眼看我.

sentences.en: I can count all my bones; people stare gloat over me.

sentences.en: I guess I could take this opportunity to gloat.
sentences.cn: 我想我会对此幸灾乐祸的.

sentences.en: I suppose you're here to gloat about the anchor position . Go ahead.
sentences.cn: 我想你是回来取代我的主持人身份的吧,它们是你的了.

sentences.en: I will not gloat over my enemies ` predicatment before killing them.
sentences.cn: 当我的敌人陷入困境,在我杀了他们之前,我不会幸灾乐祸.

sentences.en: I'm sure he'll have a good gloat over this.
sentences.cn: 我肯定他会为此幸灾乐祸.

sentences.en: It is easy to gloat when the cool jock with the hot girlfriend wrecks his sweet car, especially if he seems kind of smug.
sentences.cn: 当酷酷的大学运动员和热辣的女友坐他的爱车失事后，特别是这人有些自以为是，那么幸灾乐祸的想法是很自然会产生的。

sentences.en: It was supererogatory for her to gloat ( Mary McCarthy )
sentences.cn: 她也在一旁幸灾乐祸地看得出神,真是多余 ( 玛丽麦卡锡 )

sentences.en: It was supererogatory of her to gloat.
Never gloat over the ruin of your friend.
sentences.cn: 不要冷眼旁观看着你的朋友堕落.

sentences.en: They like to win and then they like to gloat.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢赢,然后性灾乐祸一番.

sentences.en: This is nothing to gloat about.
sentences.cn: 这没什么好幸灾乐祸的。
今天我不是幸灾乐祸才写信.

sentences.en: Yet, in announcing the news to the United States and the world, Obama was careful not to gloat, as his predecessor George W Bush might well have done had the killing taken place under his watch.
sentences.cn: 然而，在向美国和世界宣布这个消息时，奥巴马却显的小心谨慎，没有表现出一点幸灾乐祸，因为他的前任乔治·布什任期内没有完成的事情被他完成了。

words.tran_cn: 幸灾乐祸；贪婪的盯视；洋洋得意

trans.tran_en: to show in an annoying way that you are proud of your own success or happy about someone else’s failure

trans.tran_cn: 幸灾乐祸地注视，心满意足地注视，爱慕地凝视
